text: Buddy Arrington (July 26, 1938 â€“ August 2, 2022) was an American NASCAR Winston Cup Series driver. He was born in Martinsville, Virginia. His career began in 1963 and he retired in 1988. Arrington died on August 2, 2022 in Martinsville at the age of 84.Buddy Arrington, Former NASCAR Cup Series Driver, Passes Away at Age 84 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from Virginia
